class.name: position_controllers/CartesianComplianceController
class.description: The CartesianComplianceController implements Forward Dynamics Compliance Control (FDCC) [Scherzinger2017] on a set of joints. This variant sends commands to a position interface.

class.name: velocity_controllers/CartesianComplianceController
class.description: The CartesianComplianceController implements Forward Dynamics Compliance Control (FDCC) [Scherzinger2017] on a set of joints. This variant sends commands to a velocity interface.
